definitions: (of a garment) secured or drawn in by a strip of leather or other material worn around the waist

examples.text: a belted black and gold dress

shortDefinitions: secured or drawn in by strip of material around the waist

definitions: marked with a strip or encircling area that is different in nature or composition from its surroundings
shortDefinitions: marked with strip or encircling area

definitions: wearing or distinguished by a belt as a sign of rank or achievement
shortDefinitions: distinguished by belt as sign of rank or achievement
